TopicTitle: Fiery Knight (mid ranged tank with special clip)

Articles.Content:
Feurgin Ritter which is German for fiery knight (based on google )

this is a medium range mobile cannon. it uses a clip type of loading system (very easy to use) that has 8 shots. this vehicle's bullets are not the strongest and would best be used on lightly or unarmored targets. this cannon has a range between 500-600 with a medium ballistic arch. comes with a probe but has a seat for a driver also. has 253 parts. weighs in at around 20 tons. it is also stable when driving.

Download

How to fire

step 1: detach the closest bullet (doesn't matter which side)

step 2: wait for bullet to role into place in front of the cannon.

step 3: press action group 1 which will turn engine on quickly after turn it back off with the same key. (make sure engine is fully throttled up)

step 4: repeat until target is hit.
